üìã Webflow HTML Embed Examples

Copy these HTML snippets directly into Webflow HTML Embed elements to add components to your pages.

üéØ Core Components

Navigation Component
Responsive navigation with Font Awesome Pro icons and mobile menu
<div data-component="navigation" data-config='{ "variant": "sticky", "items": [ {"label": "Home", "href": "#home", "icon": "fal fa-home"}, {"label": "About", "href": "#about", "icon": "fal fa-user"}, {"label": "Services", "href": "#services", "icon": "fal fa-cog"}, {"label": "Blog", "href": "#blog", "icon": "fal fa-blog"}, {"label": "Contact", "href": "#contact", "icon": "fal fa-envelope"} ], "logoIcon": "fad fa-hexagon-vertical-nft", "showCTA": true }'></div>
Hero Section Component
Eye-catching hero section with gradient background and badge
<div data-component="hero-section" data-config='{ "title": "Welcome to Our Platform", "subtitle": "Build amazing websites with our enterprise component system and Font Awesome Pro icons", "badge": "‚ú® New Feature Available", "badgeIcon": "fad fa-sparkles", "ctaText": "Get Started Today", "ctaLink": "#contact", "backgroundIcon": "fad fa-hexagon-vertical-nft" }'></div>
Card Component
Flexible card component with hover effects and Font Awesome icons
<div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Lightning Fast Performance", "content": "Experience blazing-fast loading times with our optimized component system. Built for enterprise-scale applications.", "icon": "fad fa-bolt", "titleIcon": "fal fa-star", "variant": "featured", "badge": "Popular", "link": "#features" }'></div>
Glass Card Component
Beautiful glassmorphism effect with backdrop blur
<div data-component="glass-card" data-config='{ "title": "Glassmorphism Design", "content": "Modern glass effect with backdrop blur and subtle transparency for a sophisticated look.", "badge": "Premium", "theme": "dark", "actions": { "primary": "Learn More", "secondary": "View Demo" } }'></div>

üîó Webflow CMS Integration

CMS-Driven Hero Section
Connect hero content to Webflow CMS fields
<div data-component="hero-section" data-config='{ "title": "{{wf {"path":"hero_title"} }}", "subtitle": "{{wf {"path":"hero_subtitle"} }}", "badge": "{{wf {"path":"hero_badge"} }}", "badgeIcon": "{{wf {"path":"hero_badge_icon"} }}", "ctaText": "{{wf {"path":"hero_cta_text"} }}", "ctaLink": "{{wf {"path":"hero_cta_link"} }}" }'></div>
CMS Card Collection
Dynamic cards from Webflow CMS collections
<div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "{{wf {"path":"name"} }}", "content": "{{wf {"path":"description"} }}", "icon": "{{wf {"path":"icon"} }}", "badge": "{{wf {"path":"category"} }}", "variant": "{{wf {"path":"featured"} }}" === "true" ? "featured" : "default" }'></div>

üé® Layout Components

Feature Grid
Grid layout with multiple cards
<div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8"> <div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Scalable Architecture", "content": "Build websites that grow with your business needs.", "icon": "fad fa-expand-arrows", "badge": "Enterprise" }'></div> <div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Component-Based", "content": "Reusable components for consistent design system.", "icon": "fad fa-puzzle-piece", "badge": "Developer" }'></div> <div data-component="card" data-config='{ "title": "Performance Optimized", "content": "Lightning-fast loading with optimized assets.", "icon": "fad fa-tachometer-fast", "badge": "Performance" }'></div> </div>

‚ö° Advanced Examples

Navigation with Custom Branding
Custom logo and branding elements
<div data-component="navigation" data-config='{ "variant": "transparent", "items": [ {"label": "Products", "href": "#products", "icon": "fad fa-box-open"}, {"label": "Solutions", "href": "#solutions", "icon": "fad fa-lightbulb"}, {"label": "Pricing", "href": "#pricing", "icon": "fad fa-tags"}, {"label": "Resources", "href": "#resources", "icon": "fad fa-book"}, {"label": "Company", "href": "#company", "icon": "fad fa-building"} ], "logoIcon": "fad fa-hexagon-vertical-nft", "logoText": "Your Brand", "showCTA": true, "ctaText": "Start Free Trial" }'></div>
Hero with Multiple CTAs
Hero section with primary and secondary call-to-action buttons
<div data-component="hero-section" data-config='{ "title": "Transform Your Digital Presence", "subtitle": "Join thousands of companies using our platform to create stunning, high-converting websites", "badge": "üöÄ Now in Beta", "badgeIcon": "fad fa-rocket", "primaryCTA": "Start Building Free", "secondaryCTA": "Watch Demo", "variant": "centered" }'></div>

üîß Debug & Testing

Debug Mode Enable
Add this to enable debug logging in browser console
<script> // Enable debug mode for development if (window.ComponentSystem) { window.ComponentSystem.enableDebug(); console.log('Component System Debug Mode Enabled'); } // Log component information setTimeout(() => { if (window.debugComponents) { window.debugComponents(); } }, 2000); </script>

üí° Tip: Replace the data-config JSON with your actual content and Webflow CMS field references
